Collective Living

Totally Stockholm #25 - April 09, 2014

A feature looking at the world of collective living in Stockholm. Dotting the city with the highest number of people living solo in the world, the few communes keeping the seventies spirit alive might hold an answer to the housing crisis that’s been plaguing Stockholm for years.
